davesReview: 4 out of 5 stars! If you want a taste of Italy in SLC, I’d highly recommend Settebello’s! They have delicious thin Naples style pizzas, fresh salads, plus a gelato shop next doors. My go to’s are the Bianca, Brisket and Settebello Pizzas.
4 out of 5 stars. Nico’s Boston Style pizza makes for a delicious and hearty meal at a very affordable price. I never go without getting the Bunker Hill Pizza!

5 out of 5 stars. Pizzeria 712 is one of my favorite stops in all of Utah County. Their local/fresh menu goes beyond delicious pizzas offering incredible appetizers, salads and desserts. With a seasonal Menu, make sure to order one or two appetizers (they WON'T disappoint). My go to’s are the Braised Short Rib, Poached Pear & Burrata, Serrano and Sausage Pizza, and the Bianco. When they ask if you want dessert… Say YES! Their Almond Cake is to die for.

4 out of 5 stars - Mastra’s pasta is the best you can find in Utah County. Made fresh on the daily, each pasta dish is delicious and light. I love the Pesto Lasagna and Carbonara. Don’t forget to try their Focaccia. It is light, savory, and addicting!

5 out of 5 stars. Oteo is some of the Best Mexican food I’ve ever had in Utah. The menu is locally sourced and extremely fresh. With such a small menu, you really can’t go wrong. I love their Fruta Salad as a nice palate cleanser and the steak empanadas for my entree! Be sure to try their cronut dessert… It is Bomb!
